text: Mintje "Minny" Luimstra-Albeda (8 April 1935 â€“ 3 December 2024) was a Dutch politician. She was a member of the Christian Democratic Appeal. Luimstra- Albeda was alderman of Amsterdam from 1982 to 1990 and served as a member of the Senate from 1992 to 1999. She was a sister of former senator and minister of social affairs Wil Albeda. She received the Order of Orange-Nassau in 1991. Luimstra-Albeda died on 3 December 2024, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:Dutch politicians Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Members of the Senate of the Netherlands Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Rotterdam Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians
title: Minny Luimstra-Albeda
